name: QuickBooks Report Template
summary: Learn about .QBR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The QBR file is created when you export a report:
Choose Reports → Memorized Reports → Memorized Report List. The Memorized Report List window should be opened.
Select the report or memorized group you want to export.
Select Memorized Report, then choose Export Template. The "Specify Filename for Export" dialog box should open with "QuickBooks Report Files (*.QBR)" as the default file type.
Choose the location where you want to save the template and select Save.
To import a QBR file, follow these steps:
Go to the "Memorized Report List" window. Select Reports → Memorized Reports → Memorized Report List.
Select Memorized Report, then choose Import Template. The "Select File to Import" dialog box should open with the "Files of type" set to "QuickBooks Reports Files (*.QBR)."
Find the location that contains the report template file and double-click the file then click Open.

description: Template created by QuickBooks, an application used for entering and storing financial data; contains the template settings for exported report(s) that move between QuickBooks company files.
